amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to grant a waiver of a financial conflict of interest requirement under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act for any voting member of an advisory committee or panel of the FDA; or to make a certification under existing law for any such voting member.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 210 (Roll no. 232).
